item.title: [RS2] Tool - Never get logged out
item.dc:creator: @Bumis Bumis
item.description:
@Bumis wrote:

This script records your mouse position, then ten seconds later, it records it again. If your mouse cordinants haven’t changed, it knows that you arn’t at your computer, because the mouse isn’t moving. So if 10 seconds goes by, then it moves the mouse randomly just enough to keep you from getting logged out.

I use this alot. I keep it running behind my game, and if I leave my computer for a minute to piss or something, then I don’t get logged.

program Online;
{.include SSI2.txt}
var
x1,y1,xx,yy: Integer;

Procedure AFK;
Begin
 GetMousePos(xx,yy)
 MMouse(xx,yy,2+Random(12),2+Random(12))
End;

Procedure CheckStatus;
Begin
 Wait(1000+Random(500))
 GetMousePos(x,y)
 Status('M1: ' + IntToStr(x) + ':' + IntToStr(y) + '')
 Wait(8000+Random(500))
 GetMousePos(x1,y1)
 Status('M2: ' + IntToStr(x1) + ':' + IntToStr(y1) + '')
 Writeln('Mouse started at ' + IntToStr(x) + ':' + IntToStr(y) + ' to ' + IntToStr(x1) + ':' + IntToStr(y1) + '')
 If x=x1 then
  Begin
   AFK;
  End;
End;

begin
 Repeat
  CheckStatus;
  Wait(2000+Random(2000))
 Until(False)
end.

Read full topic
